channel.title: Runefx
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100307130901/runescape/images/0/0a/Bow_emote_icon.PNG[/img][img]http://imgur.com/DHXUh.png[/img][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100307130901/runescape/images/0/0a/Bow_emote_icon.PNG[/img]
[b]About Runefx[/b] What is it? Runefx is something I started quite awhile ago, and I have been working on it in between my other developments (Runefx Pk, WestKeep). I have finally decided to give this my full attention. This will be my development that hopefully shows my full potential as a programmer. With this development, I hope to put some original ideas into an otherwise bland download section. (I will not be releasing this until I am hosting version 3, but I will definitely be releasing at a later date)
What will it be? Runefx is currently a 317 loading higher revision graphics. My goal is to make it so that it loads both 377-474 graphics (what will be called low definition) and 508-634 graphics (high definition) It will hopefully show people that project insanity is not all bad, and can be used to make a trust worthy, stable server.
What are it's goals? Runefx has two main goals, to offer an option for those wanting to use PI, but something that is content packed, as well as stable. I will hopefully be re-writing the server core (at a later date, as I am currently not experienced enough to do this). The other goal is to show the full extent of my programming ability.
Who is developing? The current development team consists of: Me - Lead world 1 developer Marcbob - Lead world 2 developer Asshole_rule - Lead client developer
More to come on the Worlds in the future.
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100215200526/runescape/images/e/e3/Skillcape_E.png[/img][img]http://imgur.com/RVzsD.png[/img][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100215200526/runescape/images/e/e3/Skillcape_E.png[/img]
Player owned shops Full summoning Barrage orbs Re-worked combat Bones on altar Pathfinding Fully server sided player clipping Player following reworked 90% server sided NPC clipping 98% new runescape hitmarks
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100307132009/runescape/images/1/11/P_Bow.png[/img][img]http://imgur.com/gYrH3.png[/img][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100307132009/runescape/images/1/11/P_Bow.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2vacftw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/14llf1h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2s1ki0z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/11t21cw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2w2naqb.png[/img]
[/center]

item.title: Runefx
item.dc:creator: @zaz278 zaz278
item.description:
@zaz278 wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:19, topic:397667”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=494805.msg3617902#msg3617902 date=1307138149]

Your Client is gonna be beast if asshole_rule is on it by what I seen from him.
Otherwise looks good GL.

<3. Looks like shit Rash. ;D
[/quote]
Haters gonnnnna hate.

oh, and 1 suggestion to you guys… repiar some of the corrupt files on the cache :P.

I mean like some of the gfx, and anims, and npcs, like some anims are corrupt, some gfxs are different colors, (For example, almost all spells are red, even if you do water strike, or something, it will still have fire gfx, even though the IDS are different.

I know, I was going to talk to asshole about this today.

I’ve seen that player shop stuff before, but maybe that was one of the developers who made it

gg and gl

Thanks

I’ve seen that player shop stuff before, but maybe that was one of the developers who made it

gg and gl

I’ve only seen it on one other server and it was their main attraction. Idk if Rash or if asshole_rule made it but it’s really awsome.

me.

Rash did <3

<3[/quote]

No he didn’t.
Anyway’s goodluck sounds like its going to be nice. (Was the alex in game)

Read full topic

item.title: Runefx
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:13, topic:397667”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=494805.msg3617977#msg3617977 date=1307144155]

oh, and 1 suggestion to you guys… repiar some of the corrupt files on the cache :P.

I mean like some of the gfx, and anims, and npcs, like some anims are corrupt, some gfxs are different colors, (For example, almost all spells are red, even if you do water strike, or something, it will still have fire gfx, even though the IDS are different.

Gfx fix: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OEn4qlts9aA

About the anims, do you mean the missing frames? I can fix that easily. And the corrupt npcs, which are you talking about because i’ve never come in counter with them.
[/quote]
yay :).
hm… drunkletrolltern…
i can get used to that…
people said i look drunk in my irl pic…
and they said im a troll.
this could work.
But nice :).
As for the animations, like lets say turoths or something, the animations are completely corrupt, and i forgot which zombie it was, but its model is an slayer helmet. And some other zombie’s model is an angry barbarian spirit. Oh, and zombie swab animations don’t work either, found that, and alot of other animations.[/quote]

I’ll just fix the problems as I see them.

Read full topic

item.title: Runefx
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[center]

About Runefx
What is it?
Runefx is something I started quite awhile ago, and I have been working on it in between my other developments (Runefx Pk, WestKeep). I have finally decided to give this my full attention. This will be my development that hopefully shows my full potential as a programmer. With this development, I hope to put some original ideas into an otherwise bland download section. (I will not be releasing this until I am hosting version 3, but I will definitely be releasing at a later date)

What will it be?
Runefx is currently a 317 loading higher revision graphics. My goal is to make it so that it loads both 377-474 graphics (what will be called low definition) and 508-634 graphics (high definition)
It will hopefully show people that project insanity is not all bad, and can be used to make a trust worthy, stable server.

What are it’s goals?
Runefx has two main goals, to offer an option for those wanting to use PI, but something that is content packed, as well as stable. I will hopefully be re-writing the server core (at a later date, as I am currently not experienced enough to do this). The other goal is to show the full extent of my programming ability.

Who is developing?
The current development team consists of:
Me - Lead world 1 developer
Marcbob - Lead world 2 developer
Asshole_rule - Lead client developer

More to come on the Worlds in the future.

Player owned shops
Full summoning
Barrage orbs
Re-worked combat
Bones on altar
Pathfinding
Fully server sided player clipping
Player following reworked
90% server sided NPC clipping
98% new runescape hitmarks





[/center]

Read full topic
